Class AnnotationMetadataProvider

  • java.lang.Object

    MetadataProvider

    public class AnnotationMetadataProvider
extends Object
implements MetadataProvider
    A AnnotationMetadataProvider loads iPOJO metadata from bytecode of classes.

    Felix Project Team

        public List<Element> getMetadatas()
                           throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: MetadataProvider
        Gather all the metadata.
        Specified by:
        getMetadatas in interface MetadataProvider
        Returns:
        a list of iPOJO metadata (never return null)
        Throws:
        IOException - if something wet wrong during gathering.

      • computeAnnotations

        private void computeAnnotations(String name,
                      byte[] bytecode,
                      List<Element> metadata)
        Parse the content of the class to detect annotated classes.
        Parameters:
        name - Resource's name
        bytecode - the class' content to inspect.
        metadata - list of metadata to be filled
